videoSnippet.title: Najdorf DENIED! || Carlsen vs MVL || MC Invitational (2020)
videoSnippet.description:
Join Medo arena here https://lichess.org/tournament/wTZPGj68

Support fishnet here https://lichess.org/get-fishnet

Follow me on Instagram for extra content and notifications https://www.instagram.com/agadmator/

Magnus Carlsen vs Maxime Vachier Lagrave
Magnus Carlsen Invitational GAME 1, 24.4.2020
Sicilian (B54)

1. e4 c5 2. Nf3 d6 3. d4 cxd4 4. Nxd4 Nf6 5. Bc4 e6 6. O-O Be7 7. Bd3 Nc6 8. Nxc6 bxc6 9. c4 O-O 10. Nc3 e5 11. Be3 Be6 12. Qe2 Nd7 13. Rfd1 Qc7 14. b4 a5 15. a3 axb4 16. axb4 Rxa1 17. Rxa1 Rb8 18. Rb1 Nf6 19. h3 d5 20. cxd5 cxd5 21. exd5 Nxd5 22. Nxd5 Bxd5 23. b5 e4 24. Qh5 exd3 25. Qxd5 Rd8 26. Qe4 Bf8 27. b6 Qc2 28. Rc1 Qb3 29. Qf3 d2 30. Rd1 h6 31. b7 Rb8 32. Rxd2 Rxb7 33. g4 Rb8 34. Kg2 Re8 35. Rd7 Qe6 36. Qd5 Qxd5+ 37. Rxd5 g6 38. h4 Bg7 39. h5 g5 40. Kf3 Bf6 41. Ke2 Kg7 42. Kd3 Ra8 43. f4 gxf4 44. Bxf4 Ra3+ 45. Ke4 Ra6 46. Kf5 Bb2 47. Rb5 Rf6+ 48. Ke4 Re6+ 49. Kf5 Rf6+ 50. Ke4 Re6+ 51. Kf5 Rf6+

The Magnus Carlsen Invitational sees 8 of the world's best players compete online on the chess24 Playzone for a $250,000 prize fund, with $70,000 for 1st place. It begins with a single round-robin from April 18-30, with the top scoring players qualifying for the Final Four knockout.

Each match consists of four 15+10 rapid games, with the winner earning 3 match points. If the players tie 2:2 a single Armageddon game is played, where White has 5 minutes to Black's 4, but a draw sees Black win the match. An Armageddon winner gets 2 points, the loser 1. No draws offers are allowed before move 40. Official website

https://chess24.com/en/read/news/the-magnus-carlsen-invitational-starts-today
